QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT(d.Member_ID, LEN(d.Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT(d.Claim_ID, LEN(d.Claim_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, 0 AS condition_concept_id, c.admission_date AS condition_start_date, CASE WHEN d.Type_of_claim = 'Outpatient' THEN 32859 ELSE 32853 END AS condition_type_concept_id, CAST('1' + RIGHT(d.medical_facility_id, LEN(d.medical_facility_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS associated_provider_id, replace(dm.icd10_level4_code, '-', '') condition_lookup_key, dm.icd10_level4_code AS condition_source_value, CASE WHEN d.Type_of_claim = 'DPC' and Outcome in (6,7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as died1, CASE WHEN d.Type_of_claim != 'DPC' and Outcome = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as died2, date_of_medical_care_start as month_and_year_of_start, d.month_and_year_of_medical_care as month_and_year, date_of_medical_care_start as start_m_and_y_date, Suspicion_flag as suspicion_flag, d.main_disease_flag, CASE WHEN d.main_disease_flag = 1 THEN 32902 ELSE 32908 END as condition_status_concept_id, d.standard_disease_code || '|' || d.standard_disease_name source_value, 1 as fake FROM {sc}.Diagnosis d join {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.Member_ID = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE left join {sc}.Claim c on c.claim_id = d.claim_id and c.member_id = d.member_id left join {sc}.Diagnosis_master dm on d.standard_disease_code = dm.standard_disease_code order by CAST(RIGHT(d.Member_ID, LEN(d.Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT)
